text: Rădăuţi is a municipality of Suceava County in Romania. 27,759 people live in Rădăuţi. == Geography == Rădăuţi can be found in Bukovina, between the Suceava and Suceviţa rivers. It is 23 miles north of Suceava. ==References== Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Cities in Suceava County
title: Rădăuţi
